DTMod:AbstractDTCard.NAME: AbstractDTCard
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have Dragon on my side.

DTMod:BuildUp.NAME: Build Up
DTMod:BuildUp.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage and gain !M! Strength.

DTMod:SwitchingTactics.NAME: Switching Tactics
DTMod:SwitchingTactics.DESCRIPTION: Switch your team's ragontaer:Aggro. NL All enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference for this turn.
DTMod:SwitchingTactics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Switch your team's ragontaer:Aggro. NL All enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference for this turn.

DTMod:RunningTactics.NAME: Running Tactics
DTMod:RunningTactics.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You gain 2 ragontaer:Aggro.

DTMod:Draft.NAME: Draft
DTMod:Draft.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

DTMod:ForbiddenStrike.NAME: Forbidden Strike
DTMod:ForbiddenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL You cannot Upgrade any other cards at rest sites.

DTMod:OpeningTactics.NAME: Opening Tactics
DTMod:OpeningTactics.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has full HP, Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Deal !D! damage.
DTMod:OpeningTactics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If the enemy has full HP, Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Deal !D! damage.

DTMod:RefreshTactics.NAME: Refresh Tactics
DTMod:RefreshTactics.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your exhaust pile except this. NL Exhaust.
DTMod:RefreshTactics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your exhaust pile except this. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:HeadStart.NAME: Head Start
DTMod:HeadStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
DTMod:HeadStart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:CleansingStrike.NAME: Cleansing Strike
DTMod:CleansingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random Status or Curse card from anywhere.

DTMod:Training.NAME: Training
DTMod:Training.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Dragon gains !M! Strength.

DTMod:CalculatedDefense.NAME: Calculated Defense
DTMod:CalculatedDefense.DESCRIPTION: Your team takes !M! less damage from Weakened enemies.

DTMod:ExcessFootwork.NAME: Excess Footwork
DTMod:ExcessFootwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

DTMod:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
DTMod:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:ComboAttack.NAME: Combo Attack
DTMod:ComboAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage.

DTMod:BreakAttack.NAME: Break Attack
DTMod:BreakAttack.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
